name: Lindsey Rampton's Portfolio Site
tagline: Developer Portfolio Site Built on WordPress
body:
# Built with WordPress
This WordPress site uses underscore as a base to build a beautiful parallax site. 

## Parallax Panes
Each part of the homepage is using a parallax pane,  
* Bio
* Skills
* Social 
* Resume
* Contact

#Theme Usage
The Republic is built with underscore, HTML5, CSS3, SASS (compiled locally with codekit), JavaScript, and occasional PHP tweaks to add in everything that the developer wanted to include. 

### Authors and Contributors
I am Lindsey Rampton @parrottl (Parrott was my maiden name) and I'm starting this site in 2016. 

### Support or Contact
Having trouble or want to know the rules for using the theme or images? Contact me through [email](mailto:lindseyrampton@gmail.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
